text: (gentle music)
- My name is Rob Sturges.
I'm a recruiting manager with AWS.

And my team currently supports
several different customers
within the Partner Network.

The AWS Partner Network
supports all global customers
working to get AWS technology

into the hands of the
world's leading companies.
We're working to build strategies out
that are going to bring top talent to AWS.
We're executing that

through just really working
with our recruiting team,
and making sure that they know exactly
the profiles that we're looking for.
One of the key traits we look for
in Amazonian hires is ownership.

I came from a background
where a lot of times

it's, "Here's a playbook,
go execute the playbook."
Amazon's big, we have a lot of resources,
but really what separates us,
is we're looking for people
that want to add to that playbook here.
That level of ownership that you have

is the attractive part
that brought you to AWS.
(upbeat music)
You know, the biggest thing I've found

is that you have a huge
appetite for collaboration
across recruiting in the business.
We're really operating as one unit.
When you have one unit
that thinks so cohesively around talent,
you're bound to have success.

If you're mission driven and
want that type of impact,

AWS is the place that you can
really advance your career.
